data.name: Hookshot
data.description: Hookshots ,, also known as Hook Shots, are recurring Items in The Legend of Zelda series. They are machines consisting of a chain and hook. When used, the chains extend and send the hook attached towards their targets. If the hooks latch onto certain objects, Link is projected towards those objects. Link can also use them to pull enemies and objects towards him.

data.name: Nice Hookshot
data.description: The Nice Hookshot is an item in A Link Between Worlds.
